definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: But I try to be close to her.
sentences.chinese: 但是我会努力站在她身边。

sentences.english: Julie acts like a love-sick puppy when she's around Mike.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉在迈克身边时，就像是个得了相思病的小狗。

sentences.english: I double feet hair dint, the Huo ground plays white dress Human body side, the one punch hits to go out.
sentences.chinese: 我双脚发力，霍地弹到白衣人身边，一拳砸出去。

sentences.english: The best ideas have to win, otherwise you don’t have good people who stay.
sentences.chinese: 最棒的点子总会胜出，除非你身边的都是些庸才。

sentences.english: Coz I'll stand beside you through the years.
sentences.chinese: 透过你对眼，你会睇到，我永远系你身边。

sentences.english: Often rather and slowly hike to her mercilessly rumple contiguous she into bosom in.
sentences.chinese: 常宁慢慢走到她的身边，狠狠的将她揉进怀中。

sentences.english: On the table beside me burned a lamp, and near it lay a little box.
sentences.chinese: 我身边的桌上亮着一盏灯，灯旁放着一个小箱。

sentences.english: Those are all the--his conditioned stimulus.
sentences.chinese: 身边都是他的条件刺激。

sentences.english: If the person next to you is asleep, gently wake him or her up.
sentences.chinese: 如果你身边的人睡着了，轻轻地把他或她唤醒。

sentences.english: If you come back to me.
Only the dragon changed good dress to walk out and stood to the wood jump nearby.
sentences.chinese: 独龙换好衣服走了出来，站到了林跃的身边。

sentences.english: It is in our nature to judge the people around us.
sentences.chinese: 对身边人品头论足，是我们的天性使然。

sentences.english: Tiny purple fish swirl around them.
sentences.chinese: 紫色的小鱼在他们的身边打着旋儿。

sentences.english: Her darling boy was to come back to her repentant and tender-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 她的宝贝孩子即将怀着悔罪和体贴的心回到她的身边。

sentences.english: Why did you run away from me?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么从我身边跑开？

sentences.english: A large crown soon gathered around the speaker.
sentences.chinese: 讲演者身边很快聚集了一大群人。

definition: to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]
good friend/(slang) a visit from Aunt Flo (menstrual period)

in hand/(a situation is) in sb's hands
